src_original: gatiryasa (432) rvasatvanāṁtrāṇaṁ dvīpaṁparāyaṇaḥ samsāre varttamānānāṁsarvasvasti kariṣyati ||  yoṣodhāsarvadharmmāṇā mavisaṁvādakaḥ śuciḥ śucivākyaḥ śucikaraḥ sarvasvastika riṣyari ||
yāsmijtraṁ te mahāvīre samṛddhāsarva saṁpadāḥ siddhārtha siddhasaṁbhāra sarvasvastika riṣyāti |
padikāraṁ prakaṁpitāḥ vasyavodhro vasundharāḥ mārāśvadurmmanā āśāḥ sarvaḥ svastika riṣyati ||
āryyasatyanivedattaḥ sarva svastika riṣyati |  yenatīrthakarāḥ sarvejitā dharmmanatā yinā |
